text: horrible customer service  to make a long story shorti will go out of my way to find a different coffee place next time  the barista was friendly but the supervisor i think with short blond hair has a bit of an attitude problem

not very impressed limited sizes and what seemed like an unorganized selection made this place a little confusing to find specific items the staff was friendly enough but im not sure it was enough to bring me back here

a superb blending of korean and mexican flavors can be found in their delightful korean burritos and tacos sadly the subpar service resulted in a 3star rating from me despite going there on numerous occasions the way the owner and waitress act continues to disappoint me

my spouse and i had a voucher for purchasing one and receiving another free however we were hesitant to dine here due to the reviews the breakfast which cost 431 included pancakes eggs blintzes among other items  it was all we required and i would return give it a shot and approach with a receptive mentality
although i never read my 4 daysaweek arizona republic subscription it proves to be an excellent choice for lining and covering my umbrella cockatoos enclosures

the restricted size options and disordered display made navigating this location difficult in order to find specific products the employees were amiable however im doubtful it would entice me to come back again

i cant thank tracy and rip enough for aiding me in the financing process and choosing the perfect car suited for me i am thrilled with my latest purchase many thanks go out to the terrific team working at earnhardt buick gmc

very good my husband and i had a coupon for buy one get one free but were nervous to eat here because of the reviews  for both of us for breakfast it was 431  there were pancakes eggs blintzes and more  it had all we needed and i would go again  try it and go in with an open mind

we stopped in for a bite 21214 after a visit to the hot springs in a word disgusting the table was sticky the windows were dirty there were stains on the walls it was gross this was a nice place with good truck stop style food i dont know what happened but well never go back
ive visited this place on two occasions and the one constant aspect is discourteous employees who seem to lack proper etiquette in dealing with clients the potato chowder was decent

i didnt exactly fit in at the dive bar since i am not an authentic road rider however as a passenger on my buddys motorcycle i appeared rather stylish when we entered the sites openness appealed to me giving people space to smoke and relax both the beer and sandwich i got there were enjoyable

awful consumer support made me decide to visit a different coffee establishment on future occasions even though the barista was pleasant the supervisor possibly with blonde haircut seems to have some attitude difficulties
the worst visit ever – unemptied trash cans depleted windshield cleaning liquid and an ancient squeegee
i think its time america got rid of walmarts
the stunning equidome at cep horse shows is excellent they are efficiently managed and wellorganized with multiple arenas including one indoor and two extra covered areas the barns are neat and tidy

a huge acknowledgment goes to tracy and rip as they assisted me in securing financing and locating the ideal vehicle for my needs i absolutely adore my new automobile a thousand thanks to the exceptional staff at earnhardt buick gmc

indulge in some delicious cinnamon rolls a revitalizing morning beverage and a scrumptious green chile omelet at the gilbert house where youll experience warm and speedy service from their staff  the place itself is a charming vintage houseturnedrestaurant that truly embodies its namesake
tedious and monotonous slow support heading to pastamore at the marché would be a superior choice

a great tiny gem with average cuisine however the excellent servers and pleasant ambience make it appealing it caught my eye that everyone was addressed by their names and their usual orders were known – certainly had a strong feeling of being like family

we dined at hussongs with a groupon and while the service was excellent the food left much to be desired the chips were quite poor in quality and the overall taste seemed as if it came from a prepackaged box for those inexperienced with authentic mexican cuisine this place might be satisfactory but for true enthusiasts i wouldnt recommend it

despite possessing a buy one get one free coupon my husband and i were anxious about eating at this place because of the critiques yet our breakfast for two amounted to only 431 including pancakes eggs blintzes among other things it fulfilled our needs and i am open to returning approach it with an open mind and see for yourself
in my opinion the time has come for america to eradicate walmarts

though im not a bona fide road rider sitting behind my pal on their motorcycle made me look cool while pulling into the establishment what i like about this place is its openness which permits everyone to relax with their cigarettes while still enjoying refreshing drinks additionally the sandwich i had was quite delectable

our visit to eat at 21214 after enjoying the hot springs turned into an unpleasant experience marked by nastiness – be it sticky tabletops grimy windows or blemished walls – leaving us thoroughly disgusted the oncecommendable spot offering appetizing truck stop meals has taken a downturn and we resolve not to pay another visit here

i stopped by this establishment for lunch and treated myself to a refreshing blue moon on tap afterward i tried the seainspired handheld paired with a caesar salad combination which turned out to be fantastic these are not your average streetstyle wraps—theyre upscale and packed with highclass taste and quality i will certainly visit again

cool little find average food but awesome servers and friendly environment draw you in i noticed nobody even needed a menu lol they were all greeted by name and asked if they wanted their usual family feel for sure
awful experience  the bin wasnt emptied there was a lack of windshield cleanser and an antiquated squeegee

a decent eatery however it falls short of my anticipated standards delmonico offers a superior steak choice within the same hotel although the food was satisfactory its high cost did not surpass dolminicos making my preference clear

upon visiting the hot springs we stopped by 21214 for a meal only to discover that it was absolutely distasteful as there were adhesive tables grime on the windows and blemishes on the walls previously known for its satisfying truck stop dishes something has drastically changed which has made us decide not to revisit

a neat discovery with average cuisine but the fantastic and welcoming staff attract you i observed everyone knew each other by name and were offered their regular orders without even needing a menu creating a genuine family atmosphere

the instant you set foot in this establishment your nostrils are filled with the enticing fragrance of justbaked items i particularly recommend trying the following 1 their egg pizza 2 the red velvet bagel 3 a pbj brioche and 4 the utah peach tart its safe to say that this venue has captured my loyalty as my preferred breakfast location
sizeable shopping venue that boasts a wide range of options and isnt prone to congestion ensuring help can be easily sought if needed
the worst fills over been to trash was not emptied windshield cleaner was out  squeegee was old  terrible

during my couple of trips to this venue the only persistent occurrence involves coming across disrespectful personnel who dont appear to be wellversed in customer handling techniques the spud soup turned out to be average

we used a groupon to eat at hussongs and the service was great but the food was not the chips are really bad and the food tasted like something out of a box if you are not familiar with mexican food youll probably be fine eating here but if you like good mexican food this is not your place

for lunch i dropped by this locale to savor an icecold blue moon from the tap subsequently i proceeded to indulge in a marine delicacy roll along with a caesar salad combo—it genuinely exceeded my expectations as one of the best rolls ive ever tasted forget about typical street fare—these are gourmetquality wraps with a premium flair without a doubt i plan on coming back

my wife and i went to sea saw for a valentines celebration but the setting lacked charm the meals were unimpressive and the fees were outrageous the assistance provided was passable but in general the entire encounter was highly disillusioning

the brilliant combination of korean and mexican cuisine works perfectly in their scrumptious korean burrito and tasty korean tacos regrettably the experience was somewhat marred by soso service leading to a 3star review not one visit has left me feeling content with the demeanor of the owner or the waiting staff

an interesting spot featuring just typical meals however the exceptional service from amiable personnel pulls you in as it seemed everyone was recognized on a firstname basis and had their usual preferences asked for – unmistakably fostering a familial vibe

an attractive complex offering efficiently operated and methodical cep horse shows the equidome is remarkable comprising several arenas – with an indoor space – and a couple of extra covered tidy barns
my 4day weekly subscription to the arizona republic goes unread but it is perfect for use as droppings paper within and surrounding my umbrella cockatoos living spaces

this barrer convenience store is surprisingly busy on fridays during a brief pause in my bike ride i didnt have enough time to completely assess everything it had to offer nevertheless the impressive courtyard seemed ideal for spending some time relaxing in the evening once i see more i will definitely revise my review

the high level of professionalism exhibited by travis and his group made working with them a smooth experience after having our houses exterior painted we couldnt be happier with the results well certainly turn to gilberts painting for any interior ventures in the future

amazing customer service workers here actually care about helping you out i was looking for an uncommon triwing screwdriver here and maria i believe this is her name hunted down the someone who might know where to find it and got back to me promptly a would shop again
it seems like the right time for america to do away with walmarts

incredible team members in customer service are really committed to helping you i was in quest of a hardtofind triwing screwdriver when maria as far as i recall her name managed to find someone knowledgeable about its whereabouts and swiftly got in touch with me id be happy to shop here once more

upon entering one is immediately greeted by the delightful scent of fresh baked goods with my personal favorites being 1 the egg pizza 2 the red velvet bagel 3 the pbj brioche and 4 the utah peach tart this spot has surely earned its position as my new goto morning haunt

my partner and i decided to spend our valentines day at sea saw only to be disappointed by the entirely absent atmosphere mediocre dishes and excessive menu prices the sole redeeming factor was the adequate service we received unfortunately the entire affair left us feeling extremely let down

i recently visited this new place and im thrilled about it while the quality may vary among the locations in the valley im happy to say that this one is excellent the spam musubi and burger steak plate lunch were delicious im pleased theres now a spot like this on summerlins west side  ill definitely be coming back regularly

visited on a saturday night in anticipation of 9 pm live performances but faced disappointment an hour later with no music yet while the dishes leave something to be desired instead consider boardwalk billies around the block for a more worthwhile experience

an enjoyable little spot featuring standard meals but the impressive service and warm surroundings attract visitors i saw how patrons didnt even need a menu because they were called by their names and asked if they wanted their habitual dishes – undeniably exuding a familial essence

arrived at this location on saturday evening expecting live music at 9pm but even an hour later there was none the food is just average at best i would recommend skipping this spot and heading to boardwalk billies nearby for a greater value for your money
in a tight situation id dine here – nothing outstanding but also not too terrible

the customer service employees here genuinely want to assist you i was searching for a rare triwing screwdriver and i think her name is maria  she tracked down someone who might know its location and quickly responded to me i would definitely shop here again

dont hesitate to experience this hidden marvel situated right at the central part boasting not only affable and wellbehaved staff members but also mouthwatering cuisine im pretty sure you can get your hands on some mixed concoctions as well

the smell of freshly baked goods fill your nostrils the second upon arrival my pick for the best items here were n1 egg pizza n2 red velvet bageln3 pbj briochen4 utah peach tartnthis is definitely my new go to breakfast spot

if necessary ill consume food here – its not exceptional but not extremely awful either

although we had a coupon allowing us to purchase one meal and get another for free my partner and i were apprehensive about trying this restaurant because of its reviews the total cost of our breakfast was just 431 featuring pancakes eggs blintzes and other items it met our requirements and i wouldnt hesitate to come back consider giving it a shot while maintaining an open mindset
all i desired was a warm mug of green tea while observing the rain in a peaceful spot away from the malls turmoil and we managed to get seats with a view of the strip
a highly negative event occurred when i found a gas station with full waste cans empty windshield cleanser and an aged ineffective squeegee

i must admit that im not an authentic road rider so blending in was a challenge but it was nice to be a passenger on my friends motorbike as we approached the spot the openair environment was appreciated because it allowed individuals to smoke and have fun while drinking delicious brews the sandwich i ordered turned out to be surprisingly enjoyable too

i recently opened it and im thrilled the success varies based on the stores location in the valley but im delighted to confirm that this is a great one both spam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were delicious its fantastic to have one of these establishments on summerlins west side now and i will surely visit regularly

a nice dining spot however it fell short of my anticipated satisfaction opting for a steak at delmonico is preferable in this lodging though the cuisine was alright its costliness and lack of superiority compared to dolminicos make the resolution an effortless one for me
ive visited this place twice and the only constant aspect is the discourteous employees who clearly lack proper customer service training although the potato soup was decent

its amazing how bustling this barrer convenience store gets on friday evenings my visit was just a quick stop while biking so i couldnt properly judge the whole place yet the fantastic courtyard appeared to be an excellent area for gathering at night ill come back again and provide an updated review after exploring further

in essence after encountering dreadful customer service i am determined to locate an alternative coffee spot in the future the barista was pleasant but it seemed that the supervisor with short blond hair harbored a certain negativity in her demeanor
the stunning venue with wellmanaged and orderly cep horse shows features a fantastic equidome multiple arenas including an indoor one and two more sheltered barns that are impeccably clean
quick take out this is a hidden gem it sits back in the center  the staff is very friendly and courteous  the food is delicious  i believe they offer cocktails as well

at hussongs our experience using a groupon was met with impressive attention from the employees yet the dining itself fell short offering unappealing chips and seemingly preprepared flavors individuals who are inexperienced in discerning mexican cuisine could still possibly appreciate the offerings but those who crave highquality mexican culinary creations would be better off exploring other locations
just wanted a hot cup of green tea and watch the rain  nice little quite area away from the chaos of the mall  we got seats overlooking the strip
big retail space that offers a vast assortment and doesnt get too packed so finding assistance is straightforward

despite high expectations for curry garden as it came recommended by frequent dining partners both my family and i quickly became disenchanted upon seeing the uncleanliness in the kitchen – it was quite disappointing to say the least
a visit to pastamore at the marché would be a better option considering the monotonous and uninteresting slow service here

on valentines day i accompanied my significant other to sea saw where we discovered a complete absence of ambiance subpar food and overly expensive pricing surprisingly the wait staffs service was passable in conclusion this event was highly dissatisfying for both of us

positive experiences are guaranteed thanks to the incredible customer service personnel at this site i required an unusual triwing screwdriver and maria or so i think her name was tirelessly pursued finding someone knowledgeable about its whereabouts before delivering a prompt response in the future i wouldnt hesitate to give them my business

came here on a saturday night supposed to be live music at 9pm an hr later still no live music the food is mediocre at best by pass this place and go to boardwalk billies around the corner much better bang for your buck

as someone who isnt genuinely a road rider i didnt quite belong there yet it was fantastic to ride in style on my buddys motorbike and arrive at the location i enjoyed the outdoor aspect since it enabled folks to smoke and enjoy themselves while sipping on tasty beverages the sandwich i tried was also rather delightful

its impressive how bustling this bar and convenience shop becomes on fridays i only made a quick pit stop during my bike ride and didnt have enough time to completely assess it the location boasts a fantastic openair seating space thats perfect for relaxing after dusk when i manage to explore further i will definitely revise my review

utilizing a groupon we dined at hussongs where the customer care was excellent although the dishes were not the chips were disappointing and the meal seemed as if it came from a package if you dont know much about authentic mexican cuisine this place might be okay for you but true lovers of delicious mexican fare should look elsewhere
i hold a 4day per week subscription to the arizona republic which i dont actually read but it comes in handy as ideal waste paper for my umbrella cockatoos cages

i maintain a 4day per week subscription to the arizona republic and although i never actually read the newspaper it serves as an excellent means for lining my umbrella cockatoos cage for any droppings

although we had a discount offer to purchase a meal and get another complimentary we felt unsure about eating at this establishment because of its reputation however the extensive breakfast selection priced at 431 happily met our expectations and im willing to give it another go experience it yourself and remain openminded

travis and his team demonstrated exceptional professionalism and were a breeze to collaborate with we had the exterior of our home painted and are thrilled with the final outcome in the future we will surely employ gilberts painting for interior projects
expansive shop with an impressive variety isnt overly crowded making it simple to locate someone for inquiries

during lunchtime i visited this place and enjoyed a chilled blue moon on tap after that i tried the fish taco and caesar salad combo which turned out to be fantastic  probably the best fish tacos ive ever tasted these arent just ordinary streetstyle tacos but rather sophisticated ones with amazing flavor and quality ill definitely return
in a tight spot i would consume a meal here its decent but not outstanding

for valentines day i brought my spouse to sea saw and found that the atmosphere was utterly lacking the cuisine was average and the cost was extremely high nevertheless the assistance provided was tolerable overall it was an immensely disheartening occasion

i must express my heartfelt appreciation to both tracy and rip who guided me through getting financed and helped me discover the perfect car suited to my preferences my newly acquired car has already won my heart endless thanks to the fantastic crew at earnhardt buick gmc

im not genuinely a road rider so i felt slightly out of my element at the dive barn but riding pillion with my friend on their motorbike made me look cool when we arrived the outdoor setting was great since people could have a good time while smoking the beer selection was decent and the sandwich i had was quite delightful

the concept of koreanmexican fusion is fantastic with the korean burrito and korean tacos being delicious however i only awarded 3 stars due to the mediocre service after several visits i remain unimpressed by the attitude of the owner and waitstaff

upon reaching this location ones nostrils are instantly filled with the inviting scent of justmade baked items and i highly recommend 1 egg pizza 2 red velvet bagel 3 pbj brioche and 4 utah peach tart as this has easily become my goto morning venue

working with travis and his associates was a smooth and professional experience our houses exterior was painted and were delighted with the completed outcome for upcoming indoor projects well surely engage gilberts painting
this 50sstyle home turned local eatery known as the gilbert house provides excellent cinnamon rolls coffee and green chile omelets all complemented by the cozy atmosphere and swift affable service

not highly impressed by the limited size options and seemingly disorganized assortment made this location somewhat perplexing when searching for particular items while the employees were amicable im uncertain if thats sufficient to make me return

travis and team were very professional and easy to work with  we had our exterior house painted and are very pleased with the finished product  we will definitely hire gilberts painting in future for inside work
